core.description: The core of jQuery UI, required for all interactions and widgets.

datepicker.description: Displays a calendar from an input or inline for selecting dates.

effect.title: jQuery UI Effects Core
effect.description: Extends the internal jQuery effects. Includes morphing and easing. Required by all other effects.

position.description: Positions elements relative to other elements.

widget.description: Provides a factory for creating stateful widgets with a common API.
